div1.ab: Report on the General Act of Brussels
The Governor to Mister Under Secretary of State of the Colonies.
div1.p:
Mister Under Secretary of State,
I have the honor to address to you hereinafter the information that you demanded from me on the application in the Colony of the Act of the Conference of Brussels, in execution of the act. 82 of the precited act
The application of the dispositions of the Act of Brussels in that which concerns the treatment of slaves is equally better obeserved, than in the territories of the Côte d'Ivoire slavery

slavery does not exist. The administration only intervened over the course of the year 1893 against the isolated acts that only consisted in excess of protection that some indigenous pretended to exercise towards the domestics or isolated peoples that wanted to distance themselves against the convenience of their masters.

On the interior, the Colony established posts of Administrators on the Lahou and the Comsè, and none of these people had the occasion to signal to me throughout the year of 1893 the reports of the selling of slaves.

The Government of the Côte d'Ivoire equally established throughout the year posts of administrators and of customs officers on all of the coastline between Fresco and the Republic of Liberia. In view of predicting the illegal engagement of negroes on the part of the Côte said of Virou, the local government assured the regulation; and the depart of the workers of this coast is put under control of the Administration No
No engagement illicits a little thus occurs.

The establishment of these diverse posts was equally for effect of submitting the to Jeu to a control on this part of the coast like that which already existed of the in Fresco on all the arms apart from the in my , and the ammmunitions apart from the of treatment are banned in the Colonie.
It only made exceptionsin favor of some notable persons who were authorized to hunting weapons . The number of these authorizations did not 20.
In that which concerns the alcohol in the H9o the only one who could , the rights rose to 0.60 per liter. They were sufficiently risen to prevent that this commerce did not take a more .
I am with a profound Respect, Mister Under Secretary of State, Your very obedient server
